feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
